text: Virgilio Dante Caballero Pedraza (24 February 1942 - 24 March 2019) was a Mexican journalist, media researcher and politician. He was a federal deputy from 2015 to 2018 in the LXIII Legislature of the Mexican Congress and as a deputy to the Congress of Mexico City as a member of the National Regeneration Movement. He was born in Tampico, Tamaulipas. Caballero died on 24 March 2019 from a heart attack in Mexico City, aged 77. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Politicians from Tamaulipas
title: Virgilio Caballero Pedraza
